solution_line_template: There are {initial_songs} + {added_songs} = <<{initial_songs}+{added_songs}={total_songs}>>{total_songs} songs in the album.
Therefore, it will take {total_songs} x {song_duration_minutes} = <<{total_songs}*{song_duration_minutes}={total_time_minutes}>>{total_time_minutes} minutes to play the songs in the album.
